com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUISessionChangeAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUISessionChangeHandler

    public interface ISCUISessionChangeAware
    Interface which needs to be implemented and plugged-in by objects that need to handle session change.
    • Authentication Providers: LocalSession stored in session is saved in new session.
    This interface is invoked when the session is recreated for example when a user switches from guest to an actual one and the session attributes need to be preserved.
    SCUISessionChangeListener#notifyListeners(SCUIContext, boolean) SCUISessionChangeListener#addListener(ISCUISessionChangeAware) rasrinivasan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SCUISessionChangeData handleSessionChange(SCUIContext uiContext, boolean hasUserChanged)
      handleSessionChange method is called when Session changes.

    • Method Detail

      • handleSessionChange

        SCUISessionChangeData handleSessionChange(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                          boolean hasUserChanged)
        handleSessionChange method is called when Session changes. This method will return all the Session attributes and Local session attributes. uiContext the current UI Context of the type SCUIContext. hasUserChanged is true if user has changed like from guest to actual user; otherwise false. hashMap containing all the session attribute that need to be saved in new session.
